thread.title: CN's 2015 Investor Fact Book available on company's website
thread.title_full: CN's 2015 Investor Fact Book available on company's website - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: CN's 2015 Investor Fact Book available on company's website
text:
CN
MONTREAL , Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ - CN (TSX: CNR) (NYSE: CNI) announced today that its 2015 Investor Fact Book - Building for the Future - is available on the company's website at www.cn.ca/en/investors . The Investor Fact Book is a comprehensive source of information about CN, its North American rail network, freight markets, strategic agenda and financial performance.
The Fact Book underscores CN's transformational journey since its privatization in 1995. CN, which will celebrate the 20 th anniversary of its initial public offering of shares on Nov. 17 , spans eight provinces and 16 U.S. states following more than C$8 billion of acquisitions since 1998.
Building on its commitment to Operational and Service Excellence, supply chain enabling, solid execution and innovation, CN remains focused on building for the future. CN is determined to strengthen its role as a true backbone of the economy, with investments in capacity and people, and to deliver continuing value to its customers and shareholders. CN leads the North American rail industry in efficiency.
CN is a true backbone of the economy whose team of railroaders transports more than C$250 billion worth of goods annually for a wide range of business sectors, ranging from resource products to manufactured products to consumer goods, across a rail network of approximately 20,000 route-miles spanning Canada and mid-America. CN - Canadian National Railway Company, along with its operating railway subsidiaries - serves the cities and ports of Vancouver , Prince Rupert, B.C. , Montreal , Halifax , New Orleans , and Mobile, Ala. , and the metropolitan areas of Toronto , Edmonton , Winnipeg , Calgary , Chicago , Memphis , Detroit , Duluth, Minn. / Superior, Wis. , and Jackson, Miss. , with connections to all points in North America . For more information about CN, visit the company's website at www.cn.ca .
